text: Luann Bambrough (also L'Wren Scott; April 28, 1964 â€“ March 17, 2014) was an American model and fashion designer. She was the girlfriend of singer Mick Jagger for the last 13 years of her life. Scott made costumes for many movies, such as Eyes Wide Shut. Scott was born in New York City. She was adopted and was raised in Utah. ==Death== On March 17, 2014, she was found dead in her Manhattan apartment. She committed suicide by hanging. title: L'Wren Scott
